description.en:
BITRON COIN is a digitalized currency platform with excellent service, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards. BTRN is the basic unit of accounts on the TRON blockchain. BTRN is also a natural medium currency for all TRC-based tokens. BTRN connects the entire TRON ecosystem, with abundant application scenarios that power transactions and applications on the chain. BITRON COIN has established dual headquarters in the Philippines and Asia Pacific with the establishment of more overseas offices in preparation and our team in rapid expansion. We offer employees opportunities to go on international business trips and to work on overseas posts. With BITRONCOIN, you’ll be exposed to the most cutting-edge blockchain technology.

It has an in-built tracking facility. Its transaction fees are 1000 times lower than TRC20 tokens. If the tokens are transferred through the smart contracts, it costs both bandwidth points and energy consumed. Bandwidth points are used to perform BITRONCOIN transactions. It can be obtained when the holders of BTRN freeze their BTRN in an applicable wallet. Store BTRN and other digital assets Multi-chain and multi-currency, one-stop management. BTRN wallet can help manage your BTRN assets, including balance inquiry, transfer, etc. The most important thing in the wallet is the private key. Because you can control all the assets in the BTRN wallet address with your private key. Private Key self-control and secure. The market conspectus offers you a ranking of over 6000 currencies.
